swipeableDescription: Enables gesture swipes. Disables text selection.
oSeuProgressoDeLeituraOnlineEOfflineNoAp: Your online and offline reading progress is not removed, only your locally stored files.
issoProvavelmenteVaiResolverQuaisquerPro: This will probably fix any problem you are facing with the online reader.
vocEstPrestesAApagarTodosOsLivrosSalvosL: You are going to delete all your locally saved books.
dicaApenasArquivosEpubSoSuportados: Tip: Only EPUB files are supported.
vocPodeEnviarSeuArquivoLocalPorAqui: You can send your local file here.
esseArquivoNoTemOProgressoSalvoOnlineApe: This file won't have its progress saved online, only in your device.
casoOAvanoDePginasTraveMudeOCaptuloManua: If the pagination breaks, change chapters manually.
